channel.title: Rupert Murdoch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rupert Murdoch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump Files Defamation Lawsuit Against Wall Street Journal Over Epstein Report
item.description: The lawsuit sets the stage for another legal showdown initiated by Trump against the media, this time against his close ally Rupert Murdoch.
